constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extension with 2 front rooflights and solar panel and front porch extension.
decision_conditions: The proposed extension and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B, C & D and schedule 2, Part 14 Class A of the Town and County Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015

The proposal would result in a rear extension totalling approximately 5.1 metres in depth and would therefore fail to comply with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A (f) (i) & (ja) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point. Note: It is to the applicants benefit to provide as much supporting information as possible for the proposal such as plans, elevations, photographs and supporting documents.
